about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Kuberan Global Edu Solutions Limited (KGES) is a Tamil Nadu based company that offers "TEST PREP" segment services including Banking courses, Accounting & Professional Courses (CA, CS, CMA), Master of Business Administration Entrance exams, Staff Selection Commission (SSC), and Other Competitive Exams.

The company follows Kuberan class (virtual learning concept) through the use of IT to offer courses via online teaching and classroom environment. Online web conferencing, video conferencing chat rooms, Voice over IP (Internet Protocol) are used to provide e-learning facilities to clients. It also provides custom courses and offers customized training to the government, corporates, and other educational institutions. The company has training units in Coimbatore, Tuticorin, Surat, Udumalaipet.

Competitive strengths

  • Strong product portfolio with multiple courses.
  • Professional qualified and experienced management team.
  • Technical excellence and dedicated workforce.
  • Offers courses through both online and offline routes.

faqs.question: What is the Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 558000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹1.12 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹20 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on April 20, 2021, and closes on April 27, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO opens on April 20, 2021 and closes on April 27, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO will be done on Friday, April 30, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, May 4, 2021. Check the Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Kuberan Global Edu Solutions IPO listing date is on Wednesday, May 5, 2021.
